15:50 <vmassol> sdumitriu: ping  
15:50 <sdumitriu> Pong  
15:51 <vmassol> sdumitriu: gdelhumeau would like to change his PR to use "wiki" instead of "subwiki", ok for you ? (everyone else has answered that thread)  
15:51 <sdumitriu> Gotta go in 2 minutes, I'll be back in 20  
15:51 <sdumitriu> Yes  
15:51 <vmassol> (and agree)  
15:51 <sdumitriu> +1  
15:51 <vmassol> ok thanks  
15:51 <vmassol> great  
15:51 <vmassol> thanks

16:28 <sdumitriu1> has joined #xwiki  
17:00 <vmassol> guys  
17:00 <vmassol> I think what we could do re the M2 release is  
17:00 <vmassol> \* delay the M2 release by 2 days  
17:00 <vmassol> \* everyone who's not finished for M2 commit ASAP for RC1  
17:01 <vmassol> but we do need to have the first commits of each feature in M2 IMO  
17:01 <vmassol> so that the work for RC1 is seen as stabilization  
17:01 <vmassol> wdyt? is 2 days enough?  
17:02 <vmassol> note that this means that guillaumeD's PR would be applied for M2  
17:03 <vmassol> (at least the main ones and it can be fined tuned later)  
17:05 <vmassol> has quit  
17:05 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki

17:11 <tmortagne> ok for me, in two days I can have a complete wiki stream API and complete XAR output module but net yet used in the export UI  (next step is database input module)  
17:11 <vmassol1> ok  
17:11 <vmassol1> sending email
